The Fast Hough Transform Python Project
=======================================

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 1

   license
   reference

Installation
------------

To install the Fast Hough Transform Python project,
run this command in your terminal:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install fast-hough-transform


Usage
-----

Fast Hough Transform Python's usage looks like:

.. code-block:: console

   $ fast-hough-transform [OPTIONS]


.. option:: --version

   Display the version and exit.

.. option:: --help

   Display a short usage message and exit.
